text: Karl Preining is a para-alpine skier from Austria. He competed for Austria in the 1984 Winter Paralympics and 1988 Winter Paralympics. In 1984, he won three gold medals in alpine skiing: in the Men's Alpine Combination B1 event, the Men's Downhill B1 event, and the Men's Giant Slalom B1 event. == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Paralympic alpine skiers for Austria Category:Alpine skiers at the 1984 Winter Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 1984 Winter Paralympics Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Austria
title: Karl Preining
